name: Dec
description:
You play as a program that is being chased by a virus, your goal is to transform into various shapes to bypass the firewalls.

Survive throw differents musics and have fun.

Give it a try :)

Gameplay Instructions
To properly work this game, requires a keyboard that accept up to 4 inputs at a time.
Controls :
NumPad OR "Q,W,E,A,S,D,Z,X,C"

If your keyboard can't handle "num1+num3+num7+num9" (4 square transformation)

Try to use a Laptop keyboard.
